The use of application icon plus title as a standard layout is
  discouraged on API 21 devices and newer.

items.text: If you would like an application icon (but I discourage it), you can use the method setLogo().

items.text: This issue comes when you use support library revised 21.

items.text: Make sure you have the icon set in the manifest.xml file, in the application tag as:
